00024 #ifdef __win__
00025 typedef std::map<const Reference*, SimulationObject*, lessReferenceP> SOMap;
00026 #else
00027  typedef stdext::hash_map<const Reference*, SimulationObject*, hashReferenceP> SOMap;
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 
00038 class SOMapper {
00039 private:
00041      static SOMap mMap;
00042 
00043 public:
00044      static void reg(SimulationObject* c);
00045 
00051      inline static void dereg(const Reference& ref) {
00052           mMap.erase(&ref);
00053      }
00054 
00063      inline static SimulationObject* map(const Reference& ref) {
00064           SimulationObject *ret = 0;
00065           SOMap::const_iterator it = mMap.find(&ref);
00066           if (it != mMap.end()) {
00067                ret = it->second;
00068           }
00069           return ret;
00070      }
00071 
00075      inline static void clear() {
00076           mMap.clear();
00077      }
00078 
00079      static void extract(Buffer& b);
00080 
00081      friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& o, const SOMapper& m);
00082 };
